testcase.name: 20. Verify user should be able to see all fields in dashboard page
3. Verify user should be able to navigate profile page through Profile picture
4. Verify user should be able Search a Nasher
5. Verify user should be able to Change to French Language from dropdown
6. Verify user should be able to Change to English Language from dropdown
7. Verify user should be able to Change Application view to Light Mode
8. Verify user should be able to Change Application view to Dark Mode
9. Verify user should be able to see Last Contribution
10. Verify user should be able to see Contribution on Motivation tile
15. Verify user should be able to click see all button for Daily motivation tile
11. Verify user should be able to Like specific Contribution
12. Verify user should be able to Dislike specific Contribution
13. Verify user should be able to send a Comment on specific Contribution
14. Verify that the user can able to share the contribution in Social Media
15. Verify user should be able to navigate Profile page through Settings button
17. Verify user should be able to click on points and redirect to profile page
18. Verify user should be able to click on Overall ranks and redirect to profile page
19. Verify user should be able to click on Overall score and redirect to profile page
16. Verify user should be able to Logout through Settings button
